Nov. 26, 1978 D City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (2nd Section)
City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest City of Leicester Brass Band Festival city-of-leicester-brass-band-festival-2nd-section
Essay [Gregson]
De Montfort Hall, Leicester, Leicestershire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £60 and trophy, 2nd £40 and cup, 3rd £25 and cup. 6 bands competed.
Sept. 12, 2013, 10:10 a.m. March 29, 2017, 9:51 a.m.

2 Kibworth Band William Scholes
3 Ratby Co-operative Band Betty Anderson
